id: 置換対象モデルPmxファイルを選択してください
translation: Please select the replacement target model Pmx file.

id: 置換対象モデルの使い方
translation:
・You can set the Pmx model to be replaced in the name field.
・The text in the model name field can be selected.

id: 置換辞書データファイルを選択してください
translation: Please select the replacement dictionary data (Csv) file.

id: 置換辞書データの使い方
translation: ・You can specify the Csv data file that registers the replacement dictionary in the name field.

id: 出力モデル(Pmx)ファイルパスを指定してください
translation: Please specify the output model (Pmx) file path.

・You can set the output destination file path for the replacement result model.
・The output destination is automatically set, but you can change it to any path.

・Please specify the Pmx model where you want to replace the language in the name field and the Csv data file for the replacement dictionary.
・When the Pmx model and dictionary Csv are loaded, a list of replacement values for the name field will appear in the table below.
・Fields in the name column containing words registered in the dictionary will automatically be checked.
・Selecting a row outside the checkbox will display a dialog for individually modifying the names.
・You can save the model with the replacement results using the 'Save' button.

・Please specify the Pmx model whose name fields you want to export to Csv.
・Once the Pmx model is loaded, the list of name fields will be displayed in the table below.
・Names containing characters that cannot be recognized in Shift-JIS, such as Simplified Chinese, will be automatically checked.
・You can also manually select which name fields to export to Csv.
・Replacement patterns for splitting names by symbols or numbers have also been added to the view.
・Clicking on the header allows you to sort the table.
・You can save the list of names for the dictionary using the 'Save' button.

Failed to generate the replacement model.
Error message: {{.Error}}

Failed to output the replacement model.
Error message: {{.Error}}

id: 出力モデルなしメッセージ
translation:
No replaceable output model was found.
Please redo the preview.

This tool is used to replace the name field of models that contain characters not recognized by Shift-JIS.
If the model's path contains characters outside Shift-JIS, the path will also be converted based on the replacement dictionary.

id: 出力Csvファイルパスを指定してください
translation: Please specify the output Csv file path.

id: 出力Csvファイルパスの使い方
translation:
・You can set the file path for the Csv data output as the dictionary output.
・The output destination is automatically set, but you can change it to any path.

Failed to output Csv data.
Error message: {{.Error}}

id: 文字列未入力テキスト

translation:
・Specify the source Csv and the Csv to append to it
・Once the two Csv files are loaded, a list of names will be displayed in the table below
・Dictionaries that exist only in the append Csv and not in the source Csv will be automatically checked
・Click the 'Save' button to create a new Csv by adding the checked dictionary data to the source Csv

id: 追加元Csvデータファイルを選択してください
translation: Please select the source dictionary data (Csv) file

id: 追加元Csvデータの使い方
translation: ・You can specify the source Csv data file

id: 追加対象Csvデータファイルを選択してください
translation: Please select the target dictionary data (Csv) file

id: 追加対象Csvデータの使い方
translation: ・You can specify the target Csv data file
